DOC.brief_summary: HYBRID study prospective randomize open label control multi center trial , compare Hydrocoil bare platinum coil recanalization endovascular treatment intracranial aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: HYdrogel Coil Versus Bare Platinum Coil Recanalization Imaging Data Study
DOC.detailed_description: At least one Hydrocoil use Hydrocoil arm , bare platinum coil use Control arm . Primary endpoint recanalization within 1 year embolization , secondary endpoint : 1. aneurysmal rupture within 1 year embolization 2. event within 30 day embolization 3. recanalization within 6 month embolization 4. aneurysmal retreatment within 1 year embolization 5. aneurysmal rupture death within 1 year embolization 6. stroke within 1 year embolization 7. stroke , death hemorrhagic event , aneurysmal recanalization retreatment within 1 year embolization 8. change aneurysmal occlusion 9. comlicaion within 1 year embolization 10 . % length Hydrocoil , maximum diameter aneurysm , volume embolization ratio .
DOC.criteria: saccular intracranial aneurysm endovascular treatment schedule within 60days consent 2079 year old unruptured , chronic SAH acurte SAH Grade 1III 720mm size 1 year follow possibel independent ( mRS 02 ) document consent previous endovascular treat additional aneurysm schedule endovascular treatment pregnant ineligible study
